meanings.definition: A group of extinct herbivorous mammals that lived during the Eocene and Oligocene epochs.
meanings.sent1: Scientists have discovered fossils of oreodonts in ancient rock layers.
meanings.sent2: The museum has a display showcasing the skeletons of oreodonts.
meanings.sent3: The oreodonts at the museum seem to be having a lively conversation in their fossilized form.
meanings.sent4: The presence of oreodonts in the fossil record paints a vivid picture of prehistoric life.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the size of the oreodonts when they visited the museum.

meanings.sent1: Paleontologists carefully excavated the oreodonts' fossilized remains from the dig site.
meanings.sent2: The museum's collection includes a rare set of oreodonts' fossil remains.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog tried to bury a bone next to the oreodonts' fossil remains.
meanings.sent4: The oreodonts' fossil remains serve as a reminder of the Earth's ancient inhabitants.
meanings.sent5: Visitors marveled at the intricate details preserved in the oreodonts' fossil remains.

meanings.sent1: Researchers dedicated their careers to unraveling the mysteries of oreodonts.
meanings.sent2: The university offers a course on the biology and behavior of oreodonts.
meanings.sent3: The professor's office is filled with books on the study of oreodonts.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the evolution of oreodonts provides valuable insights into ancient ecosystems.
meanings.sent5: Students conducted experiments to better understand the dietary habits of oreodonts.
